title: Reply to ‘Tailoring Cognitive Interventions to Individuals’ Cognitive Profiles: Commentary on “Prevalence of Cognitive Impairments and Strengths in the Early Course of Psychosis and Depression” by Stainton et al.’
abstract: Reply to ‘Tailoring Cognitive Interventions to Individuals’ Cognitive Profiles: Commentary on “Prevalence of Cognitive Impairments and Strengths in the Early Course of Psychosis and Depression” by Stainton et al.’ - Volume 53 Issue 13
